alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Oakland; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Tuscola, Lapeer and northeastern Oakland Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 713 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Essexville to near Otisville to near Oxford. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Otter Lake and Quanicassee around 720 PM EDT. Millington around 725 PM EDT. Vassar around 730 PM EDT. Almont, Mayville and Dryden around 735 PM EDT. Imlay City and Fairgrove around 740 PM EDT. Caro, Akron and Lum around 745 PM EDT. Cass City and Brown City around 800 PM EDT. Gagetown around 805 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Goodland Township, Waterford, Colling, Wisner, Ellington, Gilford, Silverwood, Auburn Hills, Lake Angelus and Deford. People attending M1 Concourse , and Pine Knob Music Theatre should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan.
